attributes.action: Dice and Ea games for selling games unfit for purpose (battlefield 4)
attributes.additional_details:
Battlefield 4 was releases for Playstation 4 , xbox one, computer,

For the first 4 months the game ran abysmal, crashed, kicked from servers,

Late delivery of Download content

Patched and made worse

Premium players not rewarded with early access on time.   No premium waiting list.

Poor communication with complaints.
